title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Webcams
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams              webcams                       Parade Ground 1 View of parade ground with flag pole in center, the historic courthouse and jail, and the gallows in the background. The supply wagon can be seen in the foreground during the summer and fall.    View webcam          Â                    Parade Ground Parade Ground includes the flag pole in center with the historic courthouse and jail on the left. The supply wagon can be seen in the foreground during the summer and fall.   View webcam
